file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-23-04-06 - CONFIG-2 - GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the inlet of the gasper system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) GASPER SYSTEM - GENERAL VISUAL IN- 21-23-04-200-802-A EMB-135 SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-04-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. GASPER SYSTEM - GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) The screen of the inlet muffler does not permit larger pieces of dirt to go into the gasper system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 21-23-04-100-802-A/700 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 251 251HF Passenger cabin floor 252 252DF Passenger cabin floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Under the passenger cabin floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-013-A (1) Remove floor access panels 251HF and 252DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400). J. General Visual Inspection on Gasper System for Obstruction (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-013-B (1) Visually examine the inlet muffler screen for obstruction. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Clean the gasper system, if necessary (AMM TASK 21-23-04-100-802-A/700). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-013-A (1) Install floor access panels 251HF and 252DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100andAMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
